CWEs: CWE-116: Improper Encoding or Escaping of Output
description: The function is vulnerable to Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) because it uses the decodeURIComponent function to decode user-supplied input, which can lead to script injection if the input is not properly sanitized. It is also vulnerable to Object Injection because it directly assigns user-supplied input to object properties without proper validation. An attacker can manipulate the input to add or modify object properties, leading to unexpected behavior.
